definitions.definition: A temporary stop or rest ; an intermission of action; interruption ; suspension ; cessation .
A short time for relaxing and doing something else.
In writing and printing, a mark indicating the place and nature of an arrest of voice in reading; a punctuation mark .
examples: Teach the pupil to mind the pauses .

definitions.definition: A break or paragraph in writing.
A sign indicating continuance of a note or rest .
Alternative letter-case form of Pause ( “ a button that pauses or resumes something ” ) .

main_definition: A temporary stop or rest ; an intermission of action; interruption ; suspension ; cessation .
secondary_definitions: A short time for relaxing and doing something else.
In writing and printing, a mark indicating the place and nature of an arrest of voice in reading; a punctuation mark .
A break or paragraph in writing.
( music ) A sign indicating continuance of a note or rest .
Alternative letter-case form of Pause ( “ a button that pauses or resumes something ” ) .
